name: Bike Quad Race Bandits Free
description:
Experience quad bike racing for REAL up close and personal! Take your riding skills to the next level in this super fast thrill ride of a game!

Dodge oncoming vehicles and pickup fast cash for the win! Can you escape with the cash and be the baddest bandit of the street?

FEATURES:
* 3D road racing tracks!
* Cars buses, trucks and more mayhem!
* Game Center Leaderboards.

DRIVE IT TODAY!
